price: 204.Qhuraan siinil yankirriyime waqdi, toysa sinaamey kaa ankacisaay kakka hayisaay tibbi ixxica Yalli Siinih Racmatamkeh.
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ فَٱسۡتَمِعُواْ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُواْ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a al-qur'ānu fa-is'tamiʿū lahu wa-anṣitū laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
